alert.note: Alert for Holmes (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 09 at 5:32AM EST until March 09 at 6:15AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CST FOR CENTRAL HOLMES COUNTY... At 432 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 12 miles west of Bonifay, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Bonifay around 450 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Miller Crossroads, Holmes County Airport, Barker Store, Cerrogordo, Bethlehem, Prosperity, Tendil Crossing, Gritney, Arrant Settlement and Holland Crossroads. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. If a tornado or other severe weather is spotted, report it to the National Weather Service or your local nearest law enforcement agency who will send your report. This act may save lives of others in the path of dangerous weather.
